channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【How to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention?】如何使用EBPF监视Linux线程争议？
item.description: 【Learn to create a minimal scheduler written with sched_ext in C】学会创建一个用sched_ext编写的最小调度程序

item.title: 【Case Study: Polar Signals Uses eBPF to Monitor Internal Cross-Zone Network Traffic on Kubernetes, Reducing These Operating Costs by 50%】案例研究：极地信号使用EBPF监视Kubernetes上的内部跨区域网络流量，将这些运营成本降低了50％
item.description: 【Polar Signals developed kubezonnet, an open source project designed to monitor and measure cross-zone network traffic in Kubernetes clusters. The solution leverages eBPF to trace network packets and aggregate traffic data.】Polar Signals开发了Kubezonnet，这是一个开源项目，旨在监视和测量Kubernetes簇中的跨区域网络流量。该解决方案利用EBPF追踪网络数据包和汇总流量数据。

item.title: 【Debugging Memory Leaks with eBPF】通过EBPF调试内存泄漏
item.description: 【Learn how eBPF and uprobes can be combined to trace memory allocations and detect leaks】了解如何将EBPF和UPROBE组合在一起以追踪内存分配并检测泄漏

item.title: 【eBPF in 2025 - Bigger Than the CrowdStrike Outage】2025年的EBPF - 比众率的停机大
item.description: 【 In 2025 eBPF adoption will expand rapidly and other predictions】在2025年，EBPF采用将迅速扩展和其他预测

item.title: 【Transparent Packet Inspection with Netfilter and eBPF】NETFILTER和EBPF的透明数据包检查
item.description: 【Learn about transparent packet inspection with Netfilter and eBPF】了解NetFilter和EBPF的透明数据包检查

item.title: 【Tracepoints, Kprobes, or Fprobes: Which One Should You Choose?】跟踪点，kprobes或fprobes：您应该选择哪一个？
item.description: 【Tracing programs like kprobes, fprobes, and tracepoints are very popular, but their overlapping functionality can make choosing the right one confusing.】追踪Kprobes，Fprobes和TracePoint之类的程序非常受欢迎，但是它们的重叠功能可以使选择正确的一个令人困惑。

item.title: 【How to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention?】如何使用EBPF监视Linux线程争议？
item.description: 【Learn how to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention】了解如何使用EBPF监视Linux线程争议

item.title: 【شروع برنامه نویسی در ebpf با یک مثال ساده】以一个简单的示例在EBPF中开始编程
item.description: 【درباره eBPF و نحوه نوشتن برنامه eBPF بیاموزید】了解EBPF以及如何编写EBPF应用程序

item.title: 【Unit Testing eBPF Programs】单位测试EBPF程序
item.description: 【Learn how to test eBPF XDP programs】了解如何测试EBPF XDP程序

item.title: 【P99Conf: How eBPF Could Make Faster Database Systems】P99Conf：EBPF如何使数据库系统更快
item.description: 【Learn about BPF-DB, an in-memory key-value data store that can be planted within the OS kernel itself via eBPF, thereby routing around the restrictions and limitations of an OS’s user space, or the space in memory where a program is typically run】了解BPF-DB，这是一种内存中的键值数据存储，可以通过EBPF在OS内核中种植，从而围绕OS用户空间的限制和局限性进行路由，或者通常在内存中的空间。跑步
